metadata.description: Professional full-stack development marketplace featuring 37 specialized AI agents across 10 plugins (Laravel, Livewire, Filament, Vue/Nuxt, Magento2, WordPress, Electron, Flutter, Git worktree, Pro-Workflow), 64+ slash commands, Python hook system with edit tracking, quality gates, learning capture, drift detection, and session management, and custom status lines for building modern web, mobile, and desktop applications

plugins.name: laravel-development
plugins.description: Core Laravel development with 9 specialized agents (architecture, Eloquent, testing, security, optimization, Pulse, Reverb, Socialite, Prompts), 17 slash commands for models, migrations, controllers, jobs, and more. Includes Python hook system optimized for delegating agents with security checks (dangerous command blocking, .env protection), session management, transcript backups, sub-agent tracking, and custom status lines with git integration

plugins.name: livewire-development
plugins.description: Livewire 4 reactive components with single-file components, islands architecture, specialized agent and 4 slash commands for creating components, forms, layouts, and attributes. Includes new v4 features: SFC/MFC formats, Route::livewire(), wire:sort, wire:intersect, #[Defer], #[Async], and slots support

plugins.name: filament-development
plugins.description: Filament 5 admin panels with Blueprint AI planning, specialized agent and 11 slash commands for resources, pages, widgets, themes, panels, clusters, importers, exporters, and custom fields. Includes Blueprint planning format for creating detailed implementation specifications

plugins.name: vue-nuxt-development
plugins.description: Vue 3 + Nuxt 4 + TypeScript development with 8 specialized agents (Vue/Nuxt architecture, TypeScript, state management, testing, security, UX, performance) and 8 slash commands for components, pages, layouts, composables, stores, plugins, middleware, and API clients

plugins.name: magento2-development
plugins.description: Magento 2 / Adobe Commerce development with 4 specialized agents (Magento architecture, e-commerce specialist, performance, security) and 4 slash commands for modules, models, controllers, and plugins

plugins.name: wordpress-development
plugins.description: WordPress 6.0+ development with 6 specialized agents (WordPress architecture, theme/plugin specialists, Gutenberg expert, WooCommerce specialist, security) and 11 slash commands for themes, plugins, blocks, post types, taxonomies, widgets, REST API, and shortcodes

plugins.name: git-worktree-management
plugins.description: Git worktree management with 1 specialized agent and 5 slash commands for creating, managing, and optimizing multi-worktree development workflows. Includes environment isolation, database duplication, and Laravel-specific setup patterns

plugins.name: electron-development
plugins.description: Electron desktop application development with 2 specialized agents (Electron architect, React/TypeScript specialist) and 2 slash commands. Covers secure IPC patterns, system tray apps, React/TypeScript components, Radix UI, Tailwind CSS, and Electron Forge builds

plugins.name: flutter-development
plugins.description: Flutter 3.38+ mobile/desktop development with 2 specialized agents (Flutter architect, UI specialist) and 2 slash commands for feature modules and widgets. Covers clean architecture with feature modules, Riverpod 2.6+ state management with code generation, Material 3 theming, GoRouter navigation, and responsive/accessible UI patterns

plugins.name: pro-workflow
plugins.description: Self-correcting workflow system with 3 specialized agents (planner, reviewer, scout), 5 slash commands (wrap-up, learn-rule, commit, handoff, learn), 3 context modes (dev, research, review), and core rules. Features persistent learning capture to JSON, edit tracking with quality gate reminders, correction detection, drift detection, post-edit scanning for debug artifacts and secrets, and session handoff generation. All hook features are opt-in via argparse flags for backward compatibility
